Ownership Background and History The Jenz Creative Studio was founded in 2000 by Muhd Fazzuan and colleagues. A year before, Muhd Fazzuan who was working as the staff in the marketing department discovered a big problem in meeting the need of the Jenz Group in maintaining their first web page to meet the current e-marketing demand on that time. Muhd Fazzuan later initiated a plan to create Jenz’s own sub company which is not only providing graphic design, website creator and advertising consultant service to the main company but also to others as well. Together working with him in this effort is his colleagues Nurhaziqah Anuar, Nur Aqilah, Nur Izza and Romaizatul who each of them possess unique knowledge in information technology field.

1. Ownership Background and History The Jenz Creative Studio was founded in 2000 by Muhd Fazzuan and colleagues.
2. A year before, Muhd Fazzuan who was working as the staff in the marketing department discovered a big problem in meeting the need of the Jenz Group in maintaining their first web page to meet the current e-marketing demand on that time.
3. Muhd Fazzuan later initiated a plan to create Jenz’s own sub company which is not only providing graphic design, website creator and advertising consultant service to the main company but also to others as well.
4. Together working with him in this effort is his colleagues Nurhaziqah Anuar, Nur Aqilah, Nur Izza and Romaizatul who each of them possess unique knowledge in information technology field.
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random test.
